txt.en: Lore-master Rúni is at Zudramdân.\n\nYou should bring the Angmarim dragon scrolls to Lore-master Rúni.
'I wonder what secrets these Angmarim have uncovered.'

DNT - 'You found something? Oh! Many things!'

He takes the scrolls from you and immediately begins to pour over them. After a few moments, he realizes that you are still there.

'Pardon me. I get so very excited over new things to study. These scrolls are fascinating and may hold secrets that could help our cause.'
Lore scrolls can be found in Caivád Sâr, in western Elderslade.\n\nLore-master Rúni has asked you to look for dragon-kin lore scrolls.

'The Angmarim have been studying the drakes and worms of Elderslade. The information they have gathered would be a great addition to my collection. The tower of Caivád Sâr is full of scholars and priests, from what the scouts report. If you happen to venture into that fell structure, I would appreciate you bringing back anything you find related to dragon-kin.'

'You found something? Oh! Many things!'

He takes the scrolls from you and immediately begins to pore over them. After a few moments, he realizes that you are still there.

'Pardon me. I get so very excited over new things to study. These scrolls are fascinating and may hold secrets that could help our cause. Thank you again for your assistance!'
The Angmarim in Elderslade have been gathering information on the local wildlife.
